entities.description: The respondent's own problem with drug or alcohol use.
The respondent being in recovery or recovered from their own problem with drug or alcohol use.
The respondent's own problem with mental health.
The respondent being in recovery or recovered from their own mental health problem.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has had a problem with their own drug or alcohol use.
Indicates whether the respondent is in recovery or recovered from their own problem with drug or alcohol use.
Indicates whether the respondent has had a problem with their own mental health.
Indicates whether the respondent is in recovery or recovered from their own mental health problem.
